name: taqueria-scaffold-taco-shop
description: A full stack Taqueria dApp that developers can use as a starting point for building their own Tezos dApps

scripts.setup: npm run setup:taqueria && npm run setup:app
scripts.setup:taqueria: taq init && taq install @taqueria/plugin-ligo@next && taq install @taqueria/plugin-flextesa@next && taq install @taqueria/plugin-taquito@next && taq install @taqueria/plugin-jest@next && npm install && taq
